snippet: The central bank’s president, Mario Draghi, said its council discussed measures to stimulate the economy, but left interest rates unchanged.
abstract: European Central Bank debates ways to funnel more credit to suffering euro zone businesses, but decides not to act because it is not sure which way economy is heading; leaves its benchmark interest rate unchanged at its already record low rate.

byline.contributor: Julia Werdigier contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The central bank’s president, Mario Draghi, said its council discussed measures to stimulate the economy, but left interest rates unchanged.

headline.seo: European Central Bank Leaves Policy and Rate Unchanged
headline.main: European Central Bank Leaves Rate Unchanged
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank Leaves Rate Unchanged
